pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PIOA simplified, yarn-like alternative to pip.## Installation```shpip install pio```## Usage```shpio add example # Install example packagepio remove example # Remove example packagepio upgrade example # Upgrade example package (leave blank to upgrade all)pio install # Install all packages from pio.json```## Migrate from `requirements.txt````shpio migrate requirements.txt```## Programmatic usage```pythonimport pio # Import PIO packagepio.add("example") # Install example packagepio.remove("example") # Remove example packagepio.upgrade("example") # Upgrade example package (leave blank to upgrade all)pio.install() # Install all packages from pio.json```
